title: PMS 2.0 767 - OVERREACTION MONDAY, NFL Week 7 Recap, Monday Night Football Preview, Ian Rapoport, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys overreact to everything that happened in week 7 of the NFL season including the Colts, Packers, and Buccaneers all potentially being dead, the breaking news that Sam Ehlinger will be the starting Quarterback for the Colts for the rest of the season, all the teams who we thought weren't going to be any good are setting the league on fire this year, some of the disappointing injuries around the league, and they look ahead to tonight's Monday Night Football game between the Bears and Patriots. Joining the progrum to chat about all the different injury news and what to expect from tonight's Monday Night Football game Live from Gillette is NFL Network Senior Insider, Ian Rapoport (2:03:43-2:14:55). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow for Aaron Rodgers Tuesday, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
